subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Falcons are one of the N.F.L.’s surprise teams, with a 2-1 record after last season was ruined from the start by the jailing of Michael Vick and the sudden departure of Coach Bobby Petrino.
snippet: The Atlanta Falcons are one of the N.F.L.’s surprise teams, with a 2-1 record after last season was ruined from the start by the jailing of Michael Vick and the sudden departure of Coach Bobby Petrino.
